text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadir): “E wandu wangu! Kamulani masengo yatin'jile paakamula (ni ukombosi wenu wosope), une none ngukamula (mwangukamulila), basi tinchiyika kumanyilila kuti nduni jwachijiwa mbesi jakwe (jambone) pachilambo (chaduniya chino ni ku Akhera kwakwe). Chisimu chene walupuso ngawa nkupunda.”
